author: hanniabu
content:
Catching up on conversations here and this comment stood out to me. <@!301186049323958275>  stated he's worried about giving leveraged power to pool node operators and would like to incentivize solo stakers, but is also suggesting to give all MEV rewards to the pool node operator. This is a bit contradictory because it allows pool nodes operators to have full rewards which will help concentrate their power with leveraged stake. 

If you share the MEV rewards then you give the node operator only their share of rewards while also providing additional rewards to pool participants which helps them increase their ETH to have the option of becoming a solo staker.
